column5: Just got an email from Outlet Bait & Tackle...Live Target Craw Crankbaits for $4.99.  Thought I'd pass on the savings.  Cheers, Frank
Be carefull to check out the shipping costs to Canada on that site as they can be expensive. They do have terrific specials especially in the off season though.

ORdered up a few lures...split the shipping bill with a friend....not too bad.  Could have shipped it to relatives in the States for less....but after splitting the cost, it was only a few bucks more to have it delivered to my door Now if only I had stuck to just buying a couple LT craws....
Not as bad as they used to be...lures and a reel cost me $10 to ship.
That's good to know Frankie. It used to be a fortune to ship from their location to here. Thanks
Thanks for the heads up, I think I know where i'm making my next order from.
